comments_since_last_sample.body:
I absolutely love it 😍 the only thing I would change is the console table in the entry way. 
I have been living in a tiny house for more than a year with my partner (smaller than this apartment), and living in a small place taught me that every space counts if you have a tiny apartment. So I would choose a narrow drawer for the entry way. 

After living here patiently, I am so excited to have a bigger place soon (as newly married couple first actual apartment that we will move in), and please Alexandra help me to makeover my lounge/kitchen (rental and budget friendly) ☺️🙏
Omg when James came on I was WHEEZING laughing 😂
Chic, funky and fun! Love the pops of color and texture.
